channel.title: Change Max Combat 126 to 138
channel.description:
Hello, I Have 1 Simple question, How Can i make slayer lvl up players, for example max lvl right now is 126, i want max level to be 138, and if you dont know what i mean ill try to gointo more details.
uhh, ok lets say i have all 99 combat skills, except for slayer, my level would be 126, but once i start lvling up slayer my combat level increases, and once my slayer is 99, my combat level would be 138. help please, Appreciated

item.title: Change Max Combat 126 to 138
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Oh MY GOD, thank you Death Chaos, It Fking Worked, thanks, i have been looking for this for a long time, Thanks! Apreciated greatly.

Read full topic

item.title: Change Max Combat 126 to 138
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

I Vain I asked me about this a couple months back; this is the code that I gave him:

[code] int magic = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
int ranged = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
int prayer = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) * 0.125));
int summoning = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[#]) * 0.125));
int melee = (int) ((double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));
combatLevel = 0;

            if (ranged > melee) {
                    combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
                            + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
                            + prayer + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875))
                            + summoning;
            } else if (magic > melee) {
                    combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
                            + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
                            + prayer + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875))
                            + summoning;
            } else {
                    combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
                            + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
                            + prayer + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) 
                            + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325))
                            + summoning;
            }[/code]

Your current combat calculation will most likely be in the player appearance updating method (The ‘appendPlayerAppearance’ method in the Player class).

Read full topic

item.title: Change Max Combat 126 to 138
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Try this.

public void getCombat() { int j = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerAttack]); int k = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerDefence]); int l = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerStrength]); int i1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]); int j1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerPrayer]); int k1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerRanged]); int l1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerMagic]); int j2 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerSlayer]); combatLevel = (int) (((double) (k + i1) + Math.floor(j1 / 2)) * 0.25D) + 1; double d = (double) (j + l) * 0.32500000000000001D + (double) (j2) * 0.12500000000000001D; double d1 = Math.floor((double) k1 * 1.5D) * 0.32500000000000001D; double d2 = Math.floor((double) l1 * 1.5D) * 0.32500000000000001D; if (d >= d1 && d >= d2 && extraCb == 0) { combatLevel += d; } else if (d1 >= d && d1 >= d2 && extraCb == 0) { combatLevel += d1; } else if (d2 >= d && d2 >= d1 && extraCb == 0) { combatLevel += d2; } else if (extraCb > 0) { combatLevel = extraCb; } }

Read full topic

item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Alright,

public void getCombat() { int j = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerAttack]); int k = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerDefence]); int l = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerStrength]); int i1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]); int j1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerPrayer]); int k1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerRanged]); int l1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerMagic]); combatLevel = (int)(((double)(k + i1) + Math.floor(j1 / 2)) * 0.25D) + 1; double d = (double)(j + l) * 0.32500000000000001D; double d1 = Math.floor((double)k1 * 1.5D) * 0.32500000000000001D; double d2 = Math.floor((double)l1 * 1.5D) * 0.32500000000000001D; if(d >= d1 && d >= d2 && extraCb == 0) { combatLevel += d; } else if(d1 >= d && d1 >= d2 && extraCb == 0) { combatLevel += d1; } else if(d2 >= d && d2 >= d1 && extraCb == 0) { combatLevel += d2; } else if(extraCb > 0) { combatLevel = extraCb; } }

item.title: Change Max Combat 126 to 138
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

The Base is 317, And i think the source is runeworld. But Would I have to modify this code?
i located it in client.java…

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;
	if (exp > 13034430)
		return 99;
	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 138; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
				* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}

Read full topic
